design_introduction.text: 3D Design is converting an idea in a computer file.

design_how.title: How do we design?
design_how.scratch_text: We can design from scratch following your instructions.
design_how.logo_text: We can do the design from an image.

printing_intro.text: 3D Printing makes it possible to convert a computer file into a 3-dimensional. You have a project, a dream? You want to print something?

printing_industries.title: 3D Printing Industries
printing_industries.imagination: The only limit is your imagination!

printing_limitations.title: Limitations of 3D Printing
printing_limitations.intro: Were are specialized in 3D printing using Fused Model Deposition (FDM). Here you have a summary of what can and what cannot be done.
